question: Why is IITians4U the best mentoring Platform for JEE preparation?
answer: Our team of mentors includes current students at some of the top IITs.

question: What will be the mode of the mentorship?
answer: The mentorship will be in a remote setting via Zoom/Teams/Google Meet. Phone calls available for network issues.

question: What if I want to change the mentor allotted to me?
answer: It is possible. Contact our team to know more.
